Package com.worizon.jsonrpc

This package contains all classes that model a RPC transaction.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TypesUtil.TypeChecker  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Const
    Constants for JSON-RPC low level code errors.
    Const.Errors  
    JsonRpcBase
    Base class for JsonRpcRequest and JsonRpcResponse classes.
    JsonRpcError
    This class encapsulates a JSON-RPC error.
    JsonRpcRequest
    This class is the representation of a JSON-RPC request.
    JsonRpcResponse<T>
    This class represents a JSON-RPC response.
    Rpc
    Facade class to make remote procedure calls to JSON-RPC 2.0 compliant servers.
    TypesUtil
    Utility class to check array object types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonRpcException
    Base class for JSON-RPC exceptions, the error object returned from the server is bundled into this exception object.
    RemoteException
    High level exception of a remote procedure call.
    TransformerException
    Exception generated when a transformer throws an exception.

Package com.worizon.jsonrpc Description

This package contains all classes that model a RPC transaction.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Enric Cecilla
